name: df-hlim
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(chli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, chba), wcel(cv(s1), chba)), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cn, wral(s4, cfv(cuz, cv(s3)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmv, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the limit relation for Hilbert space. See ~ hlimi for its relational expression. Note that ` f : NN --> ~H ` is an infinite sequence of vectors, i.e. a mapping from integers to vectors. Definition of converge in [Beran] p. 96. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
